SELECT SHIPG_NOTE_NO AS shipgNoteNo, S.MF_DOC_ID AS mfDocId FROM TMT_SHIPG_NOTE S INNER JOIN TMT_MF M ON S.VSL_CALL_ID = M.VSL_CALL_ID AND S.MF_DOC_ID = M.MF_DOC_ID WHERE S.CATG_CD = 'E' AND S.CG_TP_CD NOT IN ('RCV', 'RMA')
AND S.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
AND S.EST_ARRV_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE (#{arrvDtFm}||' 00:00','DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') AND TO_DATE (#{arrvDtTo}||' 23:59','DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI')
AND CATG_CD IN ('E','S') AND EXISTS(SELECT GR_NO FROM TMT_GR R WHERE R.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = S.SHIPG_NOTE_NO)
AND CATG_CD IN ('E')
AND CATG_CD IN ('E','S')
AND CATG_CD IN ('S')
GROUP BY S.MF_DOC_ID, SHIPG_NOTE_NO ORDER BY S.MF_DOC_ID, SHIPG_NOTE_NO

SELECT A.BL_NO AS blNo ,A.MF_DOC_ID AS mfDocId FROM ( SELECT SCH.VSL_CALL_ID ,BL.BL_NO
,BL.DELV_TP_CD ,BL.CG_TP_CD ,BL.MF_DOC_ID ,NVL(BL.FWRD, ' ') FWDCD FROM TMT_VSL_SCH SCH, TMT_BL BL, TMT_MF MF WHERE BL.VSL_CALL_ID = MF.VSL_CALL_ID AND BL.MF_DOC_ID = MF.MF_DOC_ID
AND SCH.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
AND EST_ARRV_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE (#{arrvDtFm}||' 00:00','DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') AND TO_DATE (#{arrvDtTo}||' 23:59','DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI')
AND SCH.VSL_CD = BL.VSL_CD AND SCH.CALL_SEQ = BL.CALL_SEQ AND SCH.CALL_YEAR = BL.CALL_YEAR ) A WHERE A.CG_TP_CD NOT IN ('RCV', 'RMA') GROUP BY A.MF_DOC_ID, A.BL_NO ORDER BY A.MF_DOC_ID, A.BL_NO

SELECT 'GR' DIV, CM.OPE_CLASS_CD OPECLASSCD, GR.VSL_CALL_ID VSLCALLID, SN.SHIPG_NOTE_NO BLSN, GR.GR_NO CGNO, SN.SHIPG_AGNCY SHIPGAGNT, SN.FWRD FWRAGNT, SN.DELV_TP_CD DELVTPCD, SN.CMDT_CD CMDTCD, NVL(CM.PKG_QTY,0) + F_GET_RC_PKG_QTY(CM.VSL_CALL_ID, CM.CG_NO) GRSQTY, NVL(CM.CG_WGT,0) + F_GET_RC_WGT(CM.VSL_CALL_ID, CM.CG_NO) GRSMT,
VS2.DIR_MT DIRMT,
VS2.DIR_QTY DIRQTY, VS2.IND_MT INDMT,
VS2.IND_QTY INDQTY, WH.NOR_MT NORMT,
WH.NOR_QTY NORQTY, WH.DMG_MT DMGMT,
WH.DMG_QTY DMGQTY, WH.SHU_MT SHUMT,
WH.SHU_QTY SHUQTY, GP.GP_MT GPMT,
GP.GP_QTY GPQTY FROM TMT_SHIPG_NOTE SN,TMT_GR GR,TMT_CG_MST CM, (SELECT VSL_CALL_ID VSL_CALL_ID, CG_NO CG_NO, SUM(NVL(CG_WGT,0)) GRS_MT,
SUM(NVL(PKG_QTY,0)) GRS_QTY, SUM(DECODE(DELV_TP_CD,'D',NVL(CG_WGT,0),0)) DIR_MT,
SUM(DECODE(DELV_TP_CD,'D',NVL(PKG_QTY,0),0)) DIR_QTY, SUM(DECODE(DELV_TP_CD,'I',NVL(CG_WGT,0),0)) IND_MT,
SUM(DECODE(DELV_TP_CD,'I',NVL(PKG_QTY,0),0)) IND_QTY FROM TMT_JOB WHERE 1=1
AND VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
AND JOB_TP_CD IN ('LD','DS') AND JOB_PURP_CD IN ('GV', 'AV') GROUP BY VSL_CALL_ID,CG_NO) VS2, (SELECT TJ.VSL_CALL_ID VSL_CALL_ID, TJ.CG_NO CG_NO, SUM(DECODE(TL.WH_TP_CD,'G',TL.CG_WGT,0)) NOR_MT,
SUM(DECODE(TL.WH_TP_CD,'G',TL.PKG_QTY,0)) NOR_QTY, SUM(DECODE(TL.WH_TP_CD,'D',TL.CG_WGT,0)) DMG_MT,
SUM(DECODE(TL.WH_TP_CD,'D',TL.PKG_QTY,0)) DMG_QTY, SUM(DECODE(TL.WH_TP_CD,'S',TL.CG_WGT,0)) SHU_MT,
SUM(DECODE(TL.WH_TP_CD,'S',TL.PKG_QTY,0)) SHU_QTY FROM TMT_JOB TJ, TMT_INV_LOC TL WHERE TJ.JOB_NO = TL.JOB_NO
AND TJ.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
AND TJ.SP_CA_CO_CD IS NULL GROUP BY TJ.VSL_CALL_ID,TJ.CG_NO) WH, (SELECT VSL_CALL_ID, CG_IN_OUT_CD, CG_NO, SUM(NVL(CG_WGT,0)) GP_MT,
SUM(NVL(PKG_QTY,0)) GP_QTY FROM TMT_CG_ARRV_DELV WHERE 1=1
AND VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
AND GATE_PASS_NO IS NOT NULL GROUP BY VSL_CALL_ID,CG_IN_OUT_CD,CG_NO) GP WHERE SN.VSL_CALL_ID = GR.VSL_CALL_ID AND SN.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = GR.SHIPG_NOTE_NO AND GR.VSL_CALL_ID = VS2.VSL_CALL_ID(+) AND GR.VSL_CALL_ID =WH.VSL_CALL_ID(+) AND GR.VSL_CALL_ID = GP.VSL_CALL_ID(+) AND GR.GR_NO = VS2.CG_NO(+) AND GR.GR_NO = WH.CG_NO(+) AND GR.GR_NO = GP.CG_NO(+) AND SN.VSL_CALL_ID = CM.VSL_CALL_ID AND GR.GR_NO = CM.CG_NO
AND GR.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}

SELECT 'SN' DIV, CM.OPE_CLASS_CD OPECLASSCD, SN.VSL_CALL_ID VSLCALLID, SN.SHIPG_NOTE_NO BLSN, '' CGNO, SN.SHIPG_AGNCY SHIPGAGNT, SN.FWRD FWRAGNT, SN.DELV_TP_CD DELVTPCD, SN.CMDT_CD CMDTCD, CM.GRS_MT GRSMT,
CM.GRS_QTY GRSQTY, VS2.DIR_MT DIRMT,
VS2.DIR_QTY DIRQTY, VS2.IND_MT INDMT,
VS2.IND_QTY INDQTY, WH.NOR_MT NORMT,
WH.NOR_QTY NORQTY, WH.DMG_MT DMGMT,
WH.DMG_QTY DMGQTY, WH.SHU_MT SHUMT,
WH.SHU_QTY SHUQTY, GP.GP_MT GPMT,
GP.GP_QTY GPQTY FROM TMT_SHIPG_NOTE SN, (SELECT TC.VSL_CALL_ID VSL_CALL_ID, SN.SHIPG_NOTE_NO CG_NO, SUM(NVL(TC.PKG_QTY,0) + F_GET_RC_PKG_QTY(TC.VSL_CALL_ID, TC.CG_NO)) AS GRS_QTY, SUM(NVL(TC.CG_WGT,0) + F_GET_RC_WGT(TC.VSL_CALL_ID, TC.CG_NO)) AS GRS_MT,
TC.OPE_CLASS_CD FROM TMT_CG_MST TC, TMT_SHIPG_NOTE SN WHERE 1=1
AND TC.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
AND TC.VSL_CALL_ID = SN.VSL_CALL_ID AND TC.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = SN.SHIPG_NOTE_NO GROUP BY TC.VSL_CALL_ID,SN.SHIPG_NOTE_NO,TC.OPE_CLASS_CD) CM, (SELECT TC.VSL_CALL_ID VSL_CALL_ID, TC.SHIPG_NOTE_NO CG_NO, SUM(NVL(TJ.CG_WGT,0)) GRS_MT,
SUM(NVL(TJ.PKG_QTY,0)) GRS_QTY, SUM(DECODE(TJ.DELV_TP_CD,'D',NVL(TJ.CG_WGT,0),0)) DIR_MT,
SUM(DECODE(TJ.DELV_TP_CD,'D',NVL(TJ.PKG_QTY,0),0)) DIR_QTY, SUM(DECODE(TJ.DELV_TP_CD,'I',NVL(TJ.CG_WGT,0),0)) IND_MT,
SUM(DECODE(TJ.DELV_TP_CD,'I',NVL(TJ.PKG_QTY,0),0)) IND_QTY FROM TMT_CG_MST TC,TMT_JOB TJ WHERE 1=1
AND TJ.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
AND TJ.JOB_TP_CD IN ('LD','DS') AND TJ.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('GV', 'AV') AND TC.VSL_CALL_ID = TJ.VSL_CALL_ID AND TC.CG_NO = TJ.CG_NO AND TC.SHIPG_NOTE_NO IS NOT NULL GROUP BY TC.VSL_CALL_ID,TC.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) VS2, (SELECT TC.VSL_CALL_ID VSL_CALL_ID, TC.SHIPG_NOTE_NO CG_NO, SUM(DECODE(TL.WH_TP_CD,'G',TL.CG_WGT,0)) NOR_MT,
SUM(DECODE(TL.WH_TP_CD,'G',TL.PKG_QTY,0)) NOR_QTY, SUM(DECODE(TL.WH_TP_CD,'D',TL.CG_WGT,0)) DMG_MT,
SUM(DECODE(TL.WH_TP_CD,'D',TL.PKG_QTY,0)) DMG_QTY, SUM(DECODE(TL.WH_TP_CD,'S',TL.CG_WGT,0)) SHU_MT,
SUM(DECODE(TL.WH_TP_CD,'S',TL.PKG_QTY,0)) SHU_QTY FROM TMT_CG_MST TC,TMT_JOB TJ, TMT_INV_LOC TL WHERE TC.VSL_CALL_ID = TJ.VSL_CALL_ID AND TC.CG_NO = TJ.CG_NO AND TJ.JOB_NO = TL.JOB_NO
AND TJ.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
AND TJ.SP_CA_CO_CD IS NULL AND TC.SHIPG_NOTE_NO IS NOT NULL GROUP BY TC.VSL_CALL_ID,TC.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) WH, (SELECT TC.VSL_CALL_ID VSL_CALL_ID, TC.SHIPG_NOTE_NO CG_NO, SUM(NVL(TA.CG_WGT,0)) GP_MT,
SUM(NVL(TA.PKG_QTY,0)) GP_QTY FROM TMT_CG_MST TC,TMT_CG_ARRV_DELV TA WHERE TC.VSL_CALL_ID = TA.VSL_CALL_ID AND TC.CG_NO = TA.CG_NO
AND TA.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
AND TA.GATE_PASS_NO IS NOT NULL AND TC.SHIPG_NOTE_NO IS NOT NULL GROUP BY TC.VSL_CALL_ID,TC.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) GP WHERE SN.VSL_CALL_ID = VS2.VSL_CALL_ID(+) AND SN.VSL_CALL_ID = WH.VSL_CALL_ID(+) AND SN.VSL_CALL_ID = GP.VSL_CALL_ID(+) AND SN.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = VS2.CG_NO(+) AND SN.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = WH.CG_NO(+) AND SN.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = GP.CG_NO(+) AND SN.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = CM.CG_NO
AND SN.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}

SELECT 'BL' DIV, CM.OPE_CLASS_CD OPECLASSCD, BL.VSL_CALL_ID VSLCALLID, BL.BL_NO BLSN, '' CGNO, CM.SHIPG_AGNT SHIPGAGNT, CM.FWR_AGNT FWRAGNT, BL.DELV_TP_CD DELVTPCD, BL.CMDT_CD CMDTCD, CM.CG_WGT GRSMT,
CM.PKG_QTY GRSQTY, VS2.DIR_MT DIRMT,
VS2.DIR_QTY DIRQTY, VS2.IND_MT INDMT,
VS2.IND_QTY INDQTY, WH.NOR_MT NORMT,
WH.NOR_QTY NORQTY, WH.DMG_MT DMGMT,
WH.DMG_QTY DMGQTY, WH.SHU_MT SHUMT,
WH.SHU_QTY SHUQTY, GP.GP_MT GPMT,
GP.GP_QTY GPQTY FROM TMT_BL BL,TMT_CG_MST CM, (SELECT VSL_CALL_ID VSL_CALL_ID, CG_NO CG_NO, SUM(DECODE(DELV_TP_CD,'D',NVL(CG_WGT,0),0)) DIR_MT,
SUM(DECODE(DELV_TP_CD,'D',NVL(PKG_QTY,0),0)) DIR_QTY, SUM(DECODE(DELV_TP_CD,'I',NVL(CG_WGT,0),0)) IND_MT,
SUM(DECODE(DELV_TP_CD,'I',NVL(PKG_QTY,0),0)) IND_QTY FROM TMT_JOB WHERE 1=1
AND VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
GROUP BY VSL_CALL_ID,CG_NO) VS, (SELECT VSL_CALL_ID VSL_CALL_ID, CG_NO CG_NO, SUM(NVL(CG_WGT,0)) GRS_MT,
SUM(NVL(PKG_QTY,0)) GRS_QTY, SUM(DECODE(DELV_TP_CD,'D',NVL(CG_WGT,0),0)) DIR_MT,
SUM(DECODE(DELV_TP_CD,'D',NVL(PKG_QTY,0),0)) DIR_QTY, SUM(DECODE(DELV_TP_CD,'I',NVL(CG_WGT,0),0)) IND_MT,
SUM(DECODE(DELV_TP_CD,'I',NVL(PKG_QTY,0),0)) IND_QTY FROM TMT_JOB WHERE 1=1
AND VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
AND JOB_TP_CD IN ('LD','DS') GROUP BY VSL_CALL_ID,CG_NO) VS2, (SELECT TJ.VSL_CALL_ID VSL_CALL_ID, TJ.CG_NO CG_NO, SUM(DECODE(TL.WH_TP_CD,'G',TL.CG_WGT,0)) NOR_MT,
SUM(DECODE(TL.WH_TP_CD,'G',TL.PKG_QTY,0)) NOR_QTY, SUM(DECODE(TL.WH_TP_CD,'D',TL.CG_WGT,0)) DMG_MT,
SUM(DECODE(TL.WH_TP_CD,'D',TL.PKG_QTY,0)) DMG_QTY, SUM(DECODE(TL.WH_TP_CD,'S',TL.CG_WGT,0)) SHU_MT,
SUM(DECODE(TL.WH_TP_CD,'S',TL.PKG_QTY,0)) SHU_QTY FROM TMT_JOB TJ, TMT_INV_LOC TL WHERE TJ.JOB_NO = TL.JOB_NO
AND TJ.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
GROUP BY TJ.VSL_CALL_ID,TJ.CG_NO) WH, (SELECT VSL_CALL_ID, CG_IN_OUT_CD, CG_NO, SUM(NVL(CG_WGT,0)) GP_MT,
SUM(NVL(PKG_QTY,0)) GP_QTY FROM TMT_CG_ARRV_DELV WHERE 1=1
AND VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
AND GATE_PASS_NO IS NOT NULL GROUP BY VSL_CALL_ID,CG_IN_OUT_CD,CG_NO) GP WHERE BL.VSL_CALL_ID = VS.VSL_CALL_ID(+) AND BL.VSL_CALL_ID = VS2.VSL_CALL_ID(+) AND BL.VSL_CALL_ID =WH.VSL_CALL_ID(+) AND BL.VSL_CALL_ID = GP.VSL_CALL_ID(+) AND BL.BL_NO = VS.CG_NO(+) AND BL.BL_NO = VS2.CG_NO(+) AND BL.BL_NO = WH.CG_NO(+) AND BL.BL_NO = GP.CG_NO(+) AND BL.VSL_CALL_ID = CM.VSL_CALL_ID AND BL.BL_NO = CM.CG_NO
AND BL.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
